48000014 38E00000

90FF0008 80010010
7C0803A6 3821000C
4E800020 3D600E31
616B3F38 7D6903A6
4E800420 3D600E31
616B4218 7D6903A6
4E800420 00000000

Automatically aim the nearest kart when enabled.
Stop aiming by pressing the same activator button.
Uppon activation, if players are too far away, the aim lock will fail.

 ⚠ Respawning or driving on anti-gravity will temporarily disable the Aimbot.

Info:
Line 1 determines the activator value. (Default: 00001200)
Line 2 determines the max distance of the nearest kart to search for. (Default: 43480000)
Line 3 is the starting address of variables used by this code. (Default: 10014800)

Game Version: 4.2

Modes Supported:
 • Battle (Offline / Online)
 • Grand Prix
 • Time Trials
 • VS Race (Offline / Online)

Players Supported:
 • Wii U GamePad

Toggler:
 • Select (-)

See Button Activators:
https://pastebin.com/iYs6n7Sb

Default Data Used:
0x10014800 (12 bytes)

Source:
https://github.com/Mewtality/TCPGecko-MK8-Cheat-Codes
